abstract: zimbabwe warm-up match ahead of tri-series called off .
article: the zimbabwe squad is now scheduled to arrive in dhaka on friday to take part in the tri-nation series involving sri lanka and bangladesh Â© afpthe bangladesh cricket board , on friday , announced the warm-up match between zimbabwe and bcb xi has been cancelled because the visitors could n't arrive in bangladesh as scheduled . zimbabwe were initially expected to reach dhaka on january 10 and the match was scheduled to take place on january 13 . incidentally , the visitors had also deferred their arrival by a day and were set to reach on january 11 , only to alter their plans again following some ticketing complications .

`` the warm-up game was cancelled as it would not be possible for the visitors to play a match tomorrow after arriving in four separate groups , '' a bcb spokesperson told cricbuzz regarding cancellation of the practice game on friday . the visitors are now scheduled to arrive in dhaka on friday to take part in the tri-nation series involving sri lanka and bangladesh , commencing from january 15 .
